summary: A command‑line utility that loads a GPT model checkpoint saved in NVIDIA NeMo format, extracts its Megatron‑GPT components, maps and transfers the parameters to the newer Megatron‑Core (MCore) architecture, validates the conversion, and writes out a compatible checkpoint.
business_intent: Enable users to migrate existing NeMo GPT checkpoints to the Megatron‑Core framework, ensuring model reuse, compatibility with updated training pipelines, and leveraging performance improvements of the newer architecture.
